author: timbeiko
content:
FYI, because it's a potential blocker to some KZG library work, I've added the 4844 blob/block coupling topic to this week's ACDE agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/715

It'd be great to get folks from CL teams to share their perspectives on the topic. If you can't make the call, feel free to leave a comment in the agenda ğŸ‘
